DOC.brief_summary: STUDY QUESTION : Which four abnormally elevate androgen group ( total testosterone [ TT ] , androstenedione [ A4 ] , free androgen index [ FAI ] , dehydroepiandrosterone-sulfate [ DHEA-S ] ) present unfavorable metabolic hormonal profile , appear insulin-resistant pose additional cardiovascular risk ? SUMMARY ANSWER : Subjects excess free androgen index tend obese face high metabolic syndrome risk , adipocytokine alteration , insulin resistance ( IR ) cardiovascular risk . The excess TT group present marginal IR risk , excess A4 group high antim√ºllerian hormone ( AMH ) , may counterbalance obesity ; group excess DHEA-S group favorable association IR .
DOC.detailed_description: STUDY DESIGN , SIZE , DURATION : A retrospective study 160 Taiwanese woman HA 165 woman without HA , medical record review 2009 2012 . The hyperandrogenic woman classify four group ( TT , A4 , FAI , DHEA-S ) accord independent abnormally elevated androgen measure cut-off value , group compare control . PARTICIPANTS/MATERIALS , SETTING , METHODS : This study perform Reproductive Endocrinology Clinic Wan Fang Medical Center Taipei , Taiwan . Anthropometric , metabolic , endocrine , IR component well lipid accumulation product ( LAP ) index compare group . IR assess follow marker : fast glucose insulin level , oral glucose tolerance test , glucose-to-insulin ratio homeostasis model assessment IR index ( HOMA-IR ) .
